statements: SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, join_date, engagement_score FROM cohort_analysis;
SELECT cohort_id, last_activity_date, user_id FROM cohort_analysis WHERE engagement_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_id = 5 ORDER BY last_activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, join_date, cohort_id, last_activity_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_id = 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, cohort_id, engagement_score FROM cohort_analysis WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, cohort_id, last_activity_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE engagement_score > 75 ORDER BY last_activity_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM cohort_analysis GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT cohort_id, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM cohort_analysis WHERE join_date < '2021-08-01' GROUP BY cohort_id HAVING total_users > 10 ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_details;
SELECT cohort_id, user_id, cohort_date FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, registration_date, last_active_date FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT cohort_id, user_id, cohort_date, engagement_score FROM cohort_analysis ORDER BY cohort_date DESC;
SELECT cohort_id, user_id, cohort_date, engagement_score FROM cohort_analysis WHERE cohort_date >= '2022-01-01' AND engagement_score > 0.5 ORDER BY cohort_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, registration_date, last_active_date FROM user_details ORDER BY last_active_date DESC, registration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, registration_date, last_active_date FROM user_details WHERE DATEDIFF(last_active_date, registration_date) > 30 ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT cohort_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM cohort_analysis GROUP BY cohort_id HAVING avg_engagement_score > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_engagement_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT cohort_id, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM cohort_analysis GROUP BY cohort_id ORDER BY total_users DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username,email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT * FROM retention WHERE cohort_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(retention_id) FROM retention GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, event_name, event_type, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, events.event_name, retention.cohort_date FROM users INNER JOIN events ON users.user_id = events.user_id INNER JOIN retention ON users.user_id = retention.user_id;
SELECT events.event_name, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM events GROUP BY event_name HAVING event_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_info;
SELECT username, email FROM user_info ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_count) FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM session_data WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, cohort_id, retention_rate FROM retention_data WHERE retention_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM session_data WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_info;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT distinct user_id, cohort_date FROM retention WHERE active_users > 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, SUM(active_users) AS total_active_users FROM retention GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_active_users > 10;
SELECT cohorts.cohort_date, cohorts.total_users, retention.retained_users FROM cohorts INNER JOIN retention ON cohorts.cohort_date = retention.cohort_date;
